naslov: Kuća za odmor sa 3 apartmana i parkingom, pogled na more–Seget Vranjca (prodaja)
opis: Posredujemo u prodaji kuće za odmor sa 4 zvjezdice koja ima 3 apartmana u predivnom mjestu Seget Vranjica sa pogledom na more i blizu atraktivne plaže. Apartmani se prodaju zajedno i u cijenu su uključena 2 parking mjesta. Svaki apartman ima zaseban ulaz, a apartman br.2 i br.3 se mogu koristiti i zajedno ukoliko je potrebno, jer su povezani unutrašnjim vratima. Objekt je izgrađen 1987.g. i potpuno renoviran 2018.g kada je promijenjena fasada, kamen i parking, te je moderno uređen i opremljen. Stavljen je i video nadzor. Udaljenost od mora je 170 metara. Apartman 1 je studio apartman u suterenu, a sastoji se od sobe, kuhinje sa blagovaonom i kupatila sa wc-om. Ima zaseban ulaz i mali vrt. Apartman 2 ima zaseban ulaz sa parkinga, dvoetažan je i na donjem katu je dnevni boravak spojen s kuhinjom i blagovaonom, kupatilo sa wc-om i terasom sa pogledom na more. Na gornjem katu je spavaća soba, a može se dobiti još jedna spavaća soba. Apartman 3 se sastoji od dnevnog boravka spojenog s kuhinjom i blagovaonom iz kojeg se izlazi na terasu sa jakuzijem, kupatila sa wc-om i jedne spavaće sobe. Ovdje je potrebno djelomično uređenje. Ima zaseban ulaz i može se koristiti kao zasebna cjelina ili uz Apartman 2. Odlična prigoda za imati svoje apartmane za odmor i dobiti povrat uloga kroz iznajmljivanje jer je lokacija jako tražena i uhodana na Bookingu. Blizu je aerodrom, Trogir, Split i otoci na koje se ide na izlet turističkim brodovima. Razgled nekretnine moguć je isključivo uz potpisani Ugovor o posredovanju a što je u skladu sa Zakonom o zaštiti podataka i Zakonu o posredovanju u prometu nekretnina. Agencijska provizija je 3% Kontakt:  091/561-5115 ŽELJANA Holiday house with 3 apartments and parking, sea view - Seget Vranjica We mediate in the sale of a 4-star holiday home with 3 apartments in the beautiful town of Seget Vranjica with a view of the sea and close to an attractive beach. The apartments are sold together and the price includes 2 parking spaces. Each apartment has a separate entrance, and apartments No. 2 and No. 3 can be used together if necessary because they are connected by an internal door. The building was built in 1987. and completely renovated in 2018, when the facade, stone, and parking were changed, and it was modernly decorated and equipped. Video surveillance was installed. The distance from the sea is 170 meters. Apartment 1 is a studio apartment in the basement, consisting of a room, a kitchen with a dining area, and a bathroom with a toilet. It has a separate entrance and a small garden. Apartment 2 has a separate entrance from the parking lot, it has two floors and on the lower floor, there is a living room connected to the kitchen and dining room, a bathroom with a toilet, and a terrace with a view of the sea. There is a bedroom on the upper floor, and another bedroom is available. Apartment 3 consists of a living room connected to the kitchen and dining room, from which there is access to a terrace with a jacuzzi, a bathroom with a toilet, and one bedroom. Partial landscaping is required here. It has a separate entrance and can be used as a separate unit or with Apartment 2. A great opportunity to have your vacation apartments and get a return on investment through renting, because the location is very popular and popular on Booking. It is close to the airport, Trogir, Split, and islands that can be visited by tourist boats. Viewing the property is only possible with a signed Brokerage Agreement, which is in accordance with the Data Protection Act and the Real Estate Brokerage Act. Agency commission is 3% Contact: +385915615115 ŽELJANA
Grijanje: Sustav grijanja: Sustav grijanja, klimatizacije i ventilacije
